experience.description: Procurement of Concrete & Rebars for 11 Projects, Site wide Phase 1, General Infra Phase 1 B, Banyan Tree Main Building, Banyan Tree Villas, Banyan Tree Ancillary Building, Clubhouse Main Building, Clubhouse Ancillary Building, Clubhouse Generating Plant, Nicklaus Golfcourse, KJ Choi Golfcourse, Plan Checking Structural and Architectural, Weekly Coordination Meeting, Monitoring Reports of Excavation and Earthworks.

Project Architect Representative for Megaworld Bidding Projects, Site Supervision, Site Coordination, Request for Inspections and Approvals, Weekly meetings, Site walkthrough and inspection, Process Project Legal Documents.
Coordinate with Manosa Architect, As Built Plans, Site Visit, Inspection, Analysis for actual measurements, Estimates of Floor Tiles.
Prepare Site Activities and Updates, Rebars Estimate, CHB Estimates, Regular Meetings, Proposed Layouts, Supervised Mock up Interiors, Quality Check, Punch lists.
Site Inspection, Daily and Weekly Progress Reports, Shop Drawings, Actual Site Surveys, Proposed Design Layout of Control Tower Interior, Proposed Design Layout of DVOR site facility.
